cec.description: I developed a web-based software for managing, controlling, and administering orders and finances for a deli called Como En Casa located in Baradero, Buenos Aires Province. The platform allows predefined users to authenticate and authorize their orders and finances using OAuth2, JWT, and cookies.

tbs.description: Together with Franco Leszkiewicz, we developed a web-based system for the administrative and financial management of TheBlackSheep. The software allows for the authentication and authorization of predefined users, providing secure access to functions such as uploading, viewing, and managing information related to travel and internal finances.

dh.description: I created a landing page for a airbnb house located in Baradero, Buenos Aires province. This aim is to showcase the house, the services and amenities it offers for booking purposes.

dhAnalytics.description: I created an analytical dashboard for a country house located in Baradero, Buenos Aires province. Its function is to display statistics on reservations, income, and expenses within a specific date range or by booking channel.

hb.description: Website based on the book Atomic Habits by James Clear. The application allows users to track their habits and check whether they have completed them or not. It is still under development.

wooded.description: I performed a data analysis on the dataset of trees in green spaces in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires. This analysis includes bar graphs, tree maps, violin graphs, and choropleth maps.
wooded.title: Analysis of trees in green spaces of CABA
